name: urlshortner
description: -Shrink-URL-https://evening-lake-26109.herokuapp.com/ URL shortening is a technique on the World Wide Web in which a Uniform Resource Locator (URL) may be made substantially shorter and still direct to the required page.This is achieved by using a redirect which links to the web page that has a long URL.Often the redirect domain name is shorter than the original one.
author: Aman Agnihotri
